feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Data Services
feed.subtitle: SAP Data Services Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: SAP dataflow parallel execution vs ABAP Dataflow for big data processing
entry.content:
Hello All, 

I want to extract approx. 20 billion records from an SAP table and put the files in GCS using SAP BODS. There are 2 approaches I have been exploring. One where in I make a use of normal Dataflows that can be executed in parallel and the next where in I use a single ABAP dataflow. Both are currently working for only a small subset of data. 

1) With Parallel Dataflow: 
- I need to Manually define filters for 10 Dataflows that I am using inside my workflow. This seems to fail if any of the ranges get more than an expected limit of data. So this is not error prone. Also Manual involvement to define filters make the task a bit more tedious and open to errors. 

2) With ABAP DF: 
- I am facing an issue as I keep getting the error disk space at the given EAI location gets exhausted after a couple of hours. This again brings the need to manual put filters so our a specific subset of data can be processed. 

I was able to observe that ABAP DF (since it runs in the background) definitely able to process more records compared to normal dataflow with parallel execution (this errors out due to RFC connection limit set by basis) but both of these solutions required manual interference. 

How to Optimize and make it error prone: 
1) The question is around how can I remove the manual value assignments on my global variables for a columns that has a something is not spread out evenly or proportionately. so each filters differs. 
2) Also Is there a way to optimize the solution so there will be a lesser manual interference with the job
3) Can we create a job that utilizes both approach in a way something like we create multiple ABAP DF with each created with a DF and then replicate it to multiple DFs.  

Thanks,
Avinash

entry.title: SAP Data Services Upgrade to 4.3 SP3 on Azure cloud - help
entry.content:
Hello,
We need a help Migrating SAP DS 4.2 SP14 to Data Service 4.3 SP3 and IPS 4.3 SP4 on Azure cloud.  We need help with documents , videos or blogs how to migrate the SAP Data Services on Azure Cloud. Currently we are running a Data Services environment with the following software and versions:

SAP Data Services 4.2 SP14
SAP Information Platform Services 4.2 Support Pack 8

Application server OS: Windows Server 2019 Datacenter
Database: DB2 11.5 running on Linux server

Web Application: Tomcat

Migration tools: SAP Data Services Repository Manager


Thank You
Kiran

entry.title: SAP Data Services Designer crash after adding function module
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm trying to use a function module in a data flow

in the Query definition I select  'New Function Call' for the Schema out, select the function module, and after defined input and output parameters, clicking on Finish --> SAP Data Services Designer crash

any idea of the reasons?

thanks

entry.title: upgrading datahub 2205 from 2011. After startup idoc/receiver throws 400 error with 404 console log

entry.title: FI-GL Data of the GL Balances table with Trading partner & Transaction type
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We have a requirement to migrate GL Balances from source system to target S/4HANA system. Our requirement is to migrate the balance with the reporting fields like G/L account, Business area, Trading partner, Transaction type etc. Where our source system is using classic G/L and New G/L is not activated. 

The challenge we are facing now is, we do not have any table where the correct balance data with all these fields (Trading partner, Transaction type, business area) is available. We have checked the table GLT0, Trading partner & Transaction type is not available. We checked GLT1, which does not have the correct Balance carry forward comparing FS10n report. GLT3 table is empty in the system. We have also checked the table FAGLFLEXT which does not have any data in the system.

Would you be able to help us how do we migrate the data from ECC source system Classic G/L to S/4HANA with all the important fields.

We are looking for any Table/ Function module/ report which can help us to extract the required data.

Thank you,
Het Patel

 SAP S/4HANA Finance SAP General Ledger Migration SAP Data Services @SAPSupport

entry.title: Data Services - Error on SQL Transact
entry.content:
Hello,

I am getting an error while scheduled job has failled with " SQL submitted to database <datastore> resulted in error <>. The SQL submitted is <SQLTransact> "

And the same job has successfully ran after manually triggered. I also run it successfully after sheduled it.

Data Service Version 14.2.11.2187

Database connection via ODBC S4HANA

 

Error

Log File: error_03_13_2025_01_05_03_149__4ed10ab8_c515_45f6_b874_74f912834377.txt

(14.2) 03-13-25 01:07:04 (E) (17364:18112) DBS-070404: |Data flow DF_EXT_S4_SALES_VBAK_VBAP | Loader Query_EXT_S4_SALES_VBAK_VBAP

SQL submitted to the ODBC data source S4HANA_PROD resulted in error <>. The SQL submitted is SQLTransact.

(14.2) 03-13-25 01:08:06 (E) (12872:9500) DBS-070404: |Data flow DF_EXT_S4_SALES_VBAK_VBAP | Loader Query_EXT_S4_SALES_VBAK_VBAP

SQL submitted to the ODBC data source S4HANA_PROD resulted in error <>. The SQL submitted is SQLTransact.

kr

entry.title: SAP BODS/IS upgrade from 4.2 SP14 to 4.3 SP03
entry.content:
Hi All,

We plan to upgrade the current BODS/IS+ BIP landscape from 4.2 SPXX to DS/IS 4.3 SP03 Patch 1 + BIP 4.3 SP4 Patch 8 on Linux OS.

After referring to many SAP documents and guides, we are planning to do an in-place Upgrade to 4.3  without uninstalling the older versions of any of the products(which we are not sure how it works). Has anyone worked on a similar set of approach? or any suggestions?.

Thank you in advance for your input.

entry.title: SAP BODS4.3 Filter on Temp Table Neon PostgreSQL SQL Error
entry.content:
Hello everyone
I have a problem with the SAP Data Service 4.3 Version: 14.3.3.557
The target database is a Neon ProstgreSQL. Data loading with drop and recreate all ok. If the columns in the table are named with upper and lower case letters, there is an error as soon as a filter is applied in the data preview. Here is an example:

-----

SELECT query <SELECT "KUNNR", "NAME1", "NAME2", "ort01", "Land1"
FROM "pITCK_Test4"
WHERE Land1 = 'CH'> failed. The database error message is <SQL submitted to ODBC data source <Neon PostgreSQL> resulted in error <ERROR: column "land1" does not exist;
Error while executing the query>. The SQL submitted is <SELECT "KUNNR", "NAME1", "NAME2", "ort01", "Land1"
FROM "pITCK_Test4"
WHERE Land1 = 'CH'>.>.

------

in the following environment with DS version: 14.2.11.2003 Everything works.
Now the question is what can this be and how can it be solved. Does anyone know this behavior?

 

Greetings

entry.title: BODS: Integrity constraint violation error with Table comparison in SAP Data Services
entry.content:
Dear All,

we have BODS 4.3 and we load data from Postgresql AWS source DB to Datasphere (we recently move the target from Hana on-premise to Datasphere). 

Some delta loads end in error with the classic message: Integrity constraint violation, but the incomprehensible thing is that between source and destination there is a table comparison step that compares, by key, all the columns of the table. Shouldn't the system automatically upsert the records?Nothing changes by selecting or deselecting the 'bulk load' flag. We have solved it with the autocorrect load flag but this slows down the data loading.

Do you have any idea about this issue?

Thanks and regards

Luca

entry.title: SAP DataServices setup automation
entry.content:
Is there a way to initiate following as non-interactive commands ? 

  1. Configure DSN with SSL
  2. Test Connection with CMC console
  3. Set up AccessServer
  4. Setup JobServer
  5. Define RT services and instances from DS Management console
  6. Configure WebServices from DS Management Console

entry.title: Whether Microsoft SQL server Standard Edition is supported by SAP DATA Services?
entry.content:
Team, Good day!

 

We would like to know whether Microsoft SQL server Standard Edition is supported by SAP DATA Services.

 

I see there is a note for BOBJ. Does the same approach work for Data services?

 

Please do share us the details if there is any impact or restrictions with standard edition for SAP data services

 

3372994 - Is Microsoft SQL server Standard Edition supported with SAP BusinessObjects Platform ? - SAP for Me

entry.title: S3 Adapter configuration
entry.content:
Hello Team,


 


We are in the process of reading files placed on the S3 Bucket & trying to perform the following steps:


 


Go to the Data Services Management Console.
Navigate to Administrator > Adapters.
Add and configure the Amazon S3 Adapter with your AWS credentials.


 


But there is no S3 Adapter available in the list of Adapters. Could you please check & let us know why it is missing from BODS 14.3,3 version ? .Also what are the other available options to mount it ? Our Server is on SAP RISE.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to set-up file paths while using ABAP Dataflow in SAP DS
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

We are using SAP DS for ETL and Data migration activities. We are using ABAP Data flow in-order to extract the data from SAP Applicaiton server. where we are having an issue to locate the .dat files which gets generated and stored in the path defined under Datastore settings.

We would like to know the best practices and infra setup regarding ABAP Dataflows so that we will not have any issue in Quality and Prod migration run. Any help would be appreciated a lot!

Thank you in advance!

SAP Data Services Basis Technology

entry.title: I have a question where there is a parameter in one of the job at, but i dont see any value assigned
entry.content:
I am working on validating a job designed by someone else. There is one workflow in which one parameter is being called, i dont understand how it is getting its value. It is showing nothing under the calls section.

The jobs is completing successfully. Does it mean that no value is being passed in the parameter?

Table names in question are TRF Policy and CS Organization DIM, TRF Prem Trans and CS Product Dim. Datahub code implementation version 9.1 and SAP BODS version 4.3

entry.title: Table change not possible. There is a db trigger on the table
entry.content: "Table change not possible. There is a DB trigger on the table." I am facing this issue; how to solve this?
